originalText.text: Order came 2DD, stealth more than adequate for domestic, double vac and product would be hidden if outer pack was torn. Message from the vendor confirming item dispatch was a nice touch, very professional.

originalText.text: This place is a scam. Do not order anything from this store. The address is not even where the place is. They claim they send everything from California. The delivery company they use is also fake and never updates the tracking information. Plus the logo they have was stolen from the legit delivery company.

text.text: This place is a scam. Do not order anything from this store. The address is not even where the place is. They claim they send everything from California. The delivery company they use is also fake and never updates the tracking information. Plus the logo they have was stolen from the legit delivery company.

originalText.text: SCAM!!!! included pictures I texted about shrooms and the person asked me what baby would I like? I was thrown so I googled mushroom dispensary phone number and a site for selling exotic parrots and parakeets came up same number I’m dealing with for shrooms so in same text convo I said out the blue well I want 12 parakeets for a wedding and idiot forgot our convo started with shrooms  but no worries only 250 dollars for 12 birds lol SCAM GOOGLE THE PHONE NUMBER

originalText.text:
Important Notice Regarding Recent Review

To our Valued Customer,We want to bring to your attention a recent review we received from an individual who claims to have done business with us but has not received their order. After thorough investigation, we couldn't find any record of transactions with this individual, and their claims are not substantiated by our order history.

It appears to be a case of mistaken identity or a potential attempt to tarnish our business reputation. We assure you that we take all customer feedback seriously and are committed to providing the best service.

If you have any concerns or doubts, please reach out to our customer support team directly. We value your trust and want to ensure that our customers have accurate information about our business practices.

We appreciate your ongoing support and understanding.
